snippet: Senators should tell President Obama that Lawrence Summers would be the wrong choice for the Fed, and a big mistake.
abstract: Editorial contends Pres Obama must be told that Lawrence Summers is the wrong choice for the next Federal Reserve chairman; holds Summers's temperament is unsuited to lead the Fed, and his record on financial regulation is abysmal; urges senators who have endorsed Janet Yellen, current Fed vice chairwoman, to prevent Obama from making a big mistake.
lead_paragraph: Senators should tell President Obama that Lawrence Summers would be the wrong choice for the Fed, and a big mistake.

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
